channel.title: iPhone on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in iPhone on Alex's Blog

item.title: Restore iPhone without upgrading OS
item.description: If you need to restore your iPhone you'll notice iTunes tells you that upon restoring it, the latest version will be installed. This will be just fine for regular iPhones of course, but for the people who have a Jailbroken iPhone, it's not ok (At least until the newest version is ready for jailbreak) Well don't panic since this is a really simple thing to do, first, download the iPhone firmware you want to restore into.

item.title: Sync issues: iPhone not detected by iTunes (Windows)
item.description: Note that this is for Windows only! Some people have been experiencing this problem lately: You plugin in your iPhone, the Camera detected window pops up, iTunes may even open, but the iPhone doesn't sync or even show in the sidebar! Here is how to fix it: With the iPhone plugged it, close iTunes Go to your Control Panel Open up Administrative Tools (This name may vary depending on your language.
